original_title: SnapCube's Real-Time Fandub Goes To Hell
overview: "SnapCube's Real-Time Fandub Goes To Hell" is the newest entry in the long-running Sonic dub series, in which edgy loner Shadow The Hedgehog is challenged by Satan to prove he can become a middle manager in Hell. Shadow, however, discovers he has grander ambitions.
title: SnapCube's Real-Time Fandub Goes To Hell
